from pathlib import Path

def read_and_process(filepath):
    path = Path(filepath)
    if not path.exists():
        raise FileNotFoundError(f"File not found: {filepath}")
    
    with open(path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        lines = f.readlines()
    
    processed = [line.strip().upper() for line in lines if line.strip()]
    return processed
